mapper.insert: INSERT INTO park_public_sentiment VALUES(null, #{area_id}, #{park}, SYSDATE(), #{news_site}, #{search_key}, #{author}, #{main}, #{plate}, #{news_title}, #{bbd_type}, #{bbd_url}, #{pubdate}, #{status}, 'SYSTEM', SYSDATE(), 'SYSTEM', SYSDATE())

INSERT INTO building_public_sentiment VALUES(null, #{building_id}, SYSDATE(), #{news_site}, #{search_key}, #{author}, #{main}, #{plate}, #{news_title}, #{bbd_type}, #{bbd_url}, #{pubdate}, #{status}, 'SYSTEM', SYSDATE(), 'SYSTEM', SYSDATE())
